backend/main.mo: Motoko canister actor defining core data models (orphanages, programs, activities, people, media, schedules, kids, timeline events) and persistent storage maps, composed with authorization and blob storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing two high-confidence frontend-only features for adding and populating a "My focus today" section on the Programs page, including affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten JSON-style map summarizing the purpose of many frontend React components, pages, hooks, and utilities across authentication, dashboard layout, programs, activities, and admin features.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining design tokens, color themes (light/dark), sidebar variables, and base styles for the application.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that defines the root element and loads the React application via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React component that orchestrates authentication, profile setup, kid mode selection, and routing between login, kid mode, and the internal dashboard with theming and toasts.
frontend/src/components/activities/Activ: Modal dialog for creating and editing activities, handling form state, validation, program/orphanage selection, and mutations for create or status update.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminOnly.t: Wrapper component that conditionally renders children only for admin users, showing a loading spinner or access-denied card otherwise.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Authorization gate that blocks access for guests or undefined roles and displays an access-denied message before rendering protected content.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginCard.t: Renders a login card that authenticates users via Internet Identity, handling loading state and retrying when already authenticated.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal dialog that prompts a new user to enter their name and creates a default user profile via a mutation, with basic validation and toasts.
frontend/src/components/common/ArchiveCo: Reusable confirmation dialog for archiving actions, showing title/description and disabling actions while a pending state is active.
frontend/src/components/documentation/Do: Dialog for creating or viewing a documentation entry tied to an activity, including activity selection, content input, validation, and submission logic.
frontend/src/components/kidMode/KidModeL: Main layout for Kid Mode that manages navigation between assigned programs and attachments, displays a kid-friendly header, and allows exiting Kid Mode.
frontend/src/components/kidMode/KidModeS: Handles listing and selecting kid profiles, with auto-selection for a single profile and fallback UI for loading or no profiles.
frontend/src/components/layout/Dashboard: Top-level dashboard layout that manages section state and renders the corresponding page with a side navigation and header.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Dashboard header showing the current section title and a user menu with profile info and sign-out functionality.
frontend/src/components/layout/SideNav.t: Renders the dashboard side navigation with section buttons and icons, highlighting the current section. Conditionally shows an Admin section based on the caller's admin status.
frontend/src/components/orphanages/Orpha: Dialog form for creating or editing orphanage records with validation and submission via data hooks. Manages extensive orphanage fields and shows success/error toasts.
frontend/src/components/people/PersonDia: Dialog for adding or viewing a person, allowing creation with name, contact, and role. Editing mode is read-only and creation uses a people data hook with error handling.
frontend/src/components/programs/MyFocus: Dashboard card showing the current user's open activities and the next few upcoming events. Fetches activities and events, handles loading state, and filters by the logged-in identity.
frontend/src/components/programs/Program: Comprehensive dialog for creating or editing programs, including metadata fields, schedules, and attachment management (documents and images). Supports admin-only actions, uploads, previews, downloads, and archival of attachments.
Modal dialog that previews a program image attachment with options to close or download the file.
Renders a monthly calendar for a program showing scheduled events, with navigation, event listing per day, and admin-only interactions to create or archive events.
frontend/src/components/programs/Schedul: Modal dialog for creating a new schedule event, handling form state, date/time parsing, timestamp conversion, and submission via a create-event hook.
frontend/src/components/sprint/SprintBoa: Displays an individual activity card in the sprint board, showing title, program, status, and optional drag handle and detailed metadata.
Represents a sprint board column containing draggable activity cards, handling drag-and-drop status changes and column-level layout.
Defines activity status constants, types, color mappings, and column configurations for simple and detailed sprint board views.
frontend/src/hooks/data/useActivities.ts: Provides React Query hooks to list, create, update status, and archive activities, including sample data fallback and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/data/useAdminUsers.ts: Contains admin-related hooks for fetching users (stubbed), updating user roles, and retrieving individual user profiles via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/data/useDocumentation: Supplies hooks to list, search, create, and archive documentation entries tied to activities, with appropriate query filtering and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/data/useOperationalVi: Provides React Query hooks to fetch a program timeline and upcoming schedule events, gated by actor availability and optionally a time window.
frontend/src/hooks/data/useOrphanages.ts: Defines hooks to list, fetch, create, update, and archive orphanages, with filtering for active records and fallback to sample data when none exist.
frontend/src/hooks/data/usePeople.ts: Contains hooks to list active people, search people by name, create new people, and archive people, with React Query cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/data/useProgramAttach: Implements hooks to list, filter, and upload program media attachments (documents/images), including query invalidation, with download functionality stubbed out.
frontend/src/hooks/data/usePrograms.ts: Provides hooks to list active programs (with sample fallback) and to create, update, or archive programs while keeping related queries in sync.
frontend/src/hooks/data/useScheduleEvent: Defines hooks to list schedule events by program and to create or archive events, invalidating upcoming events and program timelines.
frontend/src/hooks/kidMode/useKidContext: Manages kid mode context with hooks to list a user's kid profiles, get the active kid, and select or clear the active kid context.
frontend/src/hooks/kidMode/useKidProgram: Provides kid-mode hooks to fetch programs and program attachments accessible to the currently active kid context.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useCurrentUse: Exposes hooks to fetch the current caller's user profile, role, and admin status, and to save profile updates.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useUserProfil: Includes hooks to fetch one or multiple user profiles by principal with caching and access-safe fallbacks, plus a helper for display names.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Provides a React Query hook that creates and caches a backend actor based on the current Internet Identity, initializing access control when authenticated and invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an authentication context and provider for Dfinity Internet Identity, managing login/logout, persisted identity loading, and detailed login status flags via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useSessionStorageStat: Defines a generic React hook that syncs component state to sessionStorage, initializing from storage and persisting updates automatically.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind CSS layers and defines extensive CSS variables for light and dark theme color palettes, base styles, and chart colors.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility function to merge conditional class names using clsx and tailwind-merge for Tailwind-friendly styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/activities/Activities: Renders the activity log UI with filtering, searching, creation, viewing, and archiving of activities, integrating authentication checks and data hooks.
Admin-only page for viewing users and updating their roles, with loading states, error handling, and role selection UI.
frontend/src/pages/documentation/Documen: Displays and manages documentation entries linked to activities, supporting search, filtering, creation, viewing, and archiving with confirmation and toasts.
frontend/src/pages/kidMode/AssignedProgr: Kid-facing page that fetches and displays programs assigned to the child, showing loading and empty states. Renders program cards with descriptions, objectives, and a button to view program materials.
frontend/src/pages/kidMode/ProgramAttach: Kid-facing page for viewing and downloading attachments for a specific program. Separates documents and images, handles downloads with toasts, and includes loading and empty states with a back navigation.
frontend/src/pages/organizations/Organiz: Admin page for managing orphanage organizations, including listing, searching, creating, editing, and archiving orphanages. Uses dialogs for create/edit and confirmation for archiving with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/people/PeoplePage.tsx: Admin page to manage people records with search and role-based filtering, creation/editing, and archiving. Handles permissions and errors with dialogs, toasts, and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/programs/ProgramsPage: Admin page for creating, searching, and archiving educational programs, with an added "My Focus Today" section and informational alerts. Uses dialogs for program management and handles authorization errors.
frontend/src/pages/sprint/SprintBoardPag: Kanban-style sprint board showing activities across programs, supporting simple and detailed views. Allows authenticated users to move activities between statuses, with sample-data protection and status update handling.
frontend/src/pages/visibility/Operationa: React page that shows operational visibility with upcoming events for the next 7 days and a per-program activity timeline, including program selection, actor name resolution, loading states, and error toasts.
frontend/src/sampleData/sampleData.ts: Provides hardcoded sample data for Programs and Orphanages, used for development or demos, including detailed metadata like objectives, schedules, budgets, capacities, and constraints.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions to read URL parameters (including hash-based routing), persist them in sessionStorage, retrieve or clear them, and safely manage navigation-related state.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions (colors, fonts, radii, animations), dark mode behavior, content paths, and plugins like typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Machine-readable snapshot of the overall project state describing Namaa.Eduâ€™s purpose, architecture, and a catalog of implemented features with versions and descriptions.
